While surfing on the internet, I have found a great site Yummy! Personal PDF Library which offers free PDF links. Actually it is like social bookmarks site del.icio.us. Concept is linking PDFs socially by adding tags. You can create your personal PDF library. Your pdf links are socially available. This concept has yielded a variety of PDF links which you can download free. You can also order a printed version of your favourite pdf from printfu.org. I liked this site a lot and have downloaded few PDF books.

Technorati Tags: yummy, pdf, pdfs, free, freeware, ebooks, ebook, social, bookmark, bookmarks, delicious, del.icio.us, tag, blog, blogs
